title: My skin concepts
body:
Hello everyone. I've been drawing different skin concepts for LoL and you may have seen some of them already (or not). Here's a little collection of them which will be updated as time goes by. I do believe it won't harm anyone if I'll have this topic for my current and future works. I hope you'll like it. 

**Blight Crystal Taric**
http://fc02.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2014/221/0/f/blight_crystal_taric_by_krizalidbrando-d7uf8r4.png
**Boxer Vi**
http://fc04.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2013/318/4/9/boxer_vi_by_krizalidbrando-d6u6z0t.png
**Cyberpunk Vi**
http://fc06.deviantart.net/fs71/i/2014/094/9/b/cyberpunk_vi_by_krizalidbrando-d7cz6n0.png
**Cursed Blade Yasuo (Muramasa)**
http://fc06.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2014/151/8/7/cursed_blade_yasuo__muramasa____skin_concept_by_krizalidbrando-d7kgwom.png
**Cyber Yi**
http://fc00.deviantart.net/fs71/i/2014/155/7/a/cyber_yi___skin_concept_by_krizalidbrando-d7kzfpd.png
**Third Riot Swain**
http://fc03.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2013/210/4/5/league_of_legends___third_riot_captain_swain_by_krizalidbrando-d6fsn1s.jpg
**Dark Gravitation Karma (Unleashed Spirit Karma)**
http://fc03.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2014/165/0/5/dark_gravitation_karma_splash_by_krizalidbrando-d7mbx2p.png
**Arcade Udyr (Hotline Miami Udyr)**
http://fc01.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2014/323/6/6/arcade_udyr_by_krizalidbrando-d86xp7o.png
**Synthpop King Taric**
http://fc08.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2014/339/f/4/synthpop_king_taric__star_gem_taric__by_krizalidbrando-d88qyrc.png
**Underworld Lucian**
http://fc01.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2014/230/1/9/underworld_lucian_by_krizalidbrando-d7vpzh6.png
**Arcade Vi (Nintendo Vi)**
http://fc05.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2013/245/2/c/arcade_vi___nintendo_version_by_krizalidbrando-d6ktgcx.png
**PROJECT: Kalista**
http://fc01.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2015/012/c/e/project__kalista_by_krizalidbrando-d8dmupa.jpg
And by the way, if anyone from Riots will actually like any of my works, I would really love to know it. Thanks.
